Body:
t = Template(
    """
            <%
                y = 10
            %>
            <%def name="a()">
                y is: ${y}
                <%
                    # should raise error ?
                    y = 15
                %>
                y is ${y}
            </%def>
            ${a()}
"""
    )
assert_raises(UnboundLocalError, t.render)
